message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with an offer of $900000, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to you is $1200000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value to you is $800000. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more profit. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'm willing to compromise at $950000. This is the lowest I can go, but I'm confident you'll find it a fair offer. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Considering the product's value to me is $1200000, I'm willing to go up to $925000. Can you meet me halfway again?
